reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Scaling up of interventions to combat malaria in Côte d’Ivoire

description.narrative: Côte d'Ivoire - Malaria - Save the Children Federation, Inc. - STC HQ. This program has the following goals: Réduire d’au moins 40% le nombre de cas de paludisme (soit de 3 375 526 cas de paludisme en 2015 à moins de 2 025 316 cas) d’ici la fin de 2020. Réduire d’au moins 40% le nombre de décès (soit de 4 385 décès liés au paludisme en 2015 à moins de 2 631 décès) d'ici la fin de 2020. The objectives of this program are: • Accroître de 50,1% en 2016 à 80% en 2020, la proportion de la population qui dort sous une moustiquaire imprégnée d’insecticide d’ici 2020. • Accroître de 46,7 % en 2016 à 80% en 2020, la proportion de femmes enceintes qui prend les deux doses de SP d’ici fin 2020. • Accroître de 22% en 2016 à 40% en 2020, la proportion de femmes enceintes qui prend les trois doses de SP d’ici fin 2020. • D’ici fin 2020, 80% des cas de paludisme sont confirmés et pris en charge selon les directives nationales dans les structures sanitaires publiques et privées ainsi que dans la communauté

title.narrative: Impact indicator for CIV-M-SCI
Confirmed malaria cases (microscopy or RDT): rate per 1000 persons per year
Inpatient malaria deaths per year: rate per 100,000 persons per year
Malaria test positivity rate
Malaria I-other 3: Inpatient malaria deaths per 100,000 persons per year
Malaria parasite prevalence: Proportion of children aged 6-59 months with malaria infection
All-cause under-5 mortality rate per 1000 live births
Coverage / Output indicator for CIV-M-SCI
CM-other 1: Number of people reached through sensitization activities on prevention measures and case management of uncomplicated malaria
Malaria O-other 3: % of pregnant women lost to follow up referred and having received a third dose of SP
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment in the community
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test in the community
SPI - Other 1: Proportion of pregnant women lost to follow-up who were found and referred and who received the third dose of intermittent preventive treatment for malaria
CM-other 3: Percentage of people who know the cause of, symptoms of, treatment for or preventive measures for malaria and reject related misconceptions
Malaria O-other 2: Number of people reached through sensitization activities on prevention measures and case management of uncomplicated malaria
CM-other 2: Number and percentage of community relais supervised
VC - other 1: Number of people reached by outreach activities for awareness-raising on measures to prevent and treat malaria
SPI-other 1: Number of pregnant women lost to follow up referred and having received a second dose of SP
Proportion of facility reports received over the reports expected during the reporting period
Outcome indicator for CIV-M-SCI
Proportion of households with at least one insecticide-treated net for every two people and/or sprayed by IRS within the last 12 months
Proportion of population using an insecticide-treated net among those with access to an insecticide-treated net
Proportion of population that slept under an insecticide-treated net the previous night
Proportion of children under five years old who slept under an insecticide-treated net the previous night
Proportion of pregnant women who slept under an insecticide-treated net the previous night
Proportion of households with at least one insecticide-treated net for every two people
Percentage of existing ITNs used the previous night
Proportion of population with access to an ITN within their household
